summary:
Stack.io[1] is an open-source tool to quickly build real-time web apps.
By directly linking clients to back-end services via WebSockets,
Stack.io helps decompose complex code into a set of simple components in
Python or Node.js. It augments standard RPC with bi-directional
streaming, and provides a layer of auth and service discovery on top.

[1]: https://github.com/dotcloud/stack.io
title: Distributed, Real-time Web Apps with Stack.io
